title: Landwer - Cinema City
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. In early-2016 the entire chain of Landwer cafes added even more vegan items to its menu. Options include breakfast, sandwiches, main dishes, and more. This branch is strictly kosher. It's located in Jerusalem's Cinema City complex, with breathtaking views.
